Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application.product

package com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application.product
Product level exceptions, all the base interactions of a User with it's owned products for sale and Cart.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application
    Application level exceptions, provides useful handling and information for all the different user interactions.
    com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application.product.constants
    Provides constant values in enumeration classes and different items that help with the handling of products and the Cart.
    com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application.plant
    Plant level exceptions, all the base interactions of a User with it's owned plants.
    com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application.user
    User level exceptions, all the base interactions of a User account and it's attributes.
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    InvalidProductException
    Custom exception class to indicate a failure that happened with an interaction made by a User with it's owned products and cart.
